contents:
Note: It no longer works.
 The IP2location team already solved this problem the next day I made a report, I didn’t receive any response, they just silently fixed it.
Facebook provides a debugger tool for its scraper. Interestingly, it can be used without being blocked by the CAPTCHA.
Example: https://developers.facebook.com/tools/debug/echo/?q=https://www.ip2location.com/8.8.8.8
By developing a tool for web scrapping it is possible to visualize the information better.
 Copy of full report
title: Report: IP2location bypass demo limitations

contents:
Here I will publish a bit of my experience as a security researcher reporting vulnerabilities and what I have learned in this area.
 Not everything can be published.
 Soon with a lot of content.
title: The first post

contents:
Independent security researcher, I look for vulnerabilities and report them.
This is really like a hobby.
title: About
